# sectionHeaderTopPadding

**Instance Property**

The amount of padding above each section header.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var sectionHeaderTopPadding: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableView/automaticDimension].

## Configuring header and footer appearance

- **sectionHeaderHeight**: The height of section headers in the table view.
- **sectionFooterHeight**: The height of section footers in the table view.
- **estimatedSectionHeaderHeight**: The estimated height of section headers in the table view.
- **estimatedSectionFooterHeight**: The estimated height of section footers in the table view.
